title: 999 gets a lift – Hydrogen ambulances on the way!
lead: The NHS hydrogen fuel cell vehicle is expected to hit the streets later this year

title: Birmingham secures £4.5m to boost active travel
lead: The funding will support new pop-up cycle lanes and walking infrastructure

title: Green agenda hijacked as carbon prices jump, but will energy prices be contained?
lead: Carbon jumps again with the green agenda hijacked, but will prices be contained?

title: India’s renewables target requires $500bn investment by 2030
lead: Nearly $300 billion is needed for wind and solar infrastructure, new report estimates

title: Energy majors bp and Chevron back start-up focused on geothermal energy
lead: Eavor says its technology differs from other forms of geothermal in that it is a scalable ‘go anywhere’ solution, harvesting geothermal heat to generate dispatchable power with zero emissions

title: New data reveals decline in toxic emissions from US power plants
lead: The fall in emissions are primarily due to changes in the mix of fuels used in electricity generation, with data revealing a 19% fall in coal generation and an increase in natural gas and renewable production

title: Energy switching plummets by almost a quarter in January
lead: Figures suggest there were the fewest switches for January since 2018

title: EAC calls for VAT cuts on green sectors to build back better
lead: MPs suggest wider tax changes could offer a reset to design an economy fit for net zero Britain

title: Plans for new gigafactory at Coventry Airport unveiled
lead: The facility is predicted to create thousands of green jobs and attract up to £2bn of investment

title: New waste-to-jet fuel plant takes off in Stanlow
lead: The new facility is predicted to produce 100 million litres of low carbon SAF every year
